pageContext.title: In brief: Construction software startup raises funding from Wavemaker, Seeds Capital
pageContext.content:
Novade announced today it has finalized a round of funding with Wavemaker Partners and Seeds Capital, the investment arm of government agency Enterprise Singapore. Using mobile apps, Novade automates the digitization of on-site paper-based processes in the construction industry. The data captured can be used to streamline operations and improve quality, safety, and productivity at a construction site. Operating across Europe and Asia-Pacific, Novade says it works with the largest companies in the industry.

Source: Press release
